Nijpels |leader_party = [[People's Party for Freedom and Democracy|VVD]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 41.98 |area_land_km2 = 41.66 |area_water_km2 = 0.32 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 11214 |population_density_km2 = 269 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd = 52.70 |latNS = N |longd = 4.95 |longEW = E |website = [http://www.opmeer.nl www.opmeer.nl] }} '''Opmeer''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Opmeer.ogg}})([[West Frisian (dialect)|West Frisian]]: ''Opmar'' or ''Obmar'') is a municipality and town in the [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[North Holland]] and the region of [[West Friesland (region)|West-Frisia]]. ==Population centres == The municipality of Opmeer consists of the following cities, towns, villages and/or districts: [[Aartswoud]], [[De Weere (Opmeer)|De Weere]], [[Gouwe]], [[Hoogwoud]], Opmeer, [[Spanbroek]], [[Wadway]], [[Zandwerven]]. == Local government == The municipal council of Opmeer consists of 15 seats, which are divided as follows: * [[Christian Democratic Appeal|CDA]] - 5 seats * [[Gemeentebelangen Opmeer]] - 4 seats * [[Labour Party (Netherlands)|PvdA]] - 3 seats * [[DSV (political party)|DSV]] - 2 seats * [[People's Party for Freedom and Democracy|VVD]] - 1 seat The CDA and the Gemeentebelangen Opmeer are in a coalition government. == References == * Statistics are taken from the [http://www.sdu.nl/staatscourant/gemeentes/gem372nh.htm SDU Staatscourant] == External links== {{Commons category}} *[http://www.plattegronden.nl/opmeer/index.html A map of Opmeer] *[http://www.plattegronden.nl/gemeenteopmeer/index.html A map of the entire municipality] {{Geographic location | Centre = Opmeer | North = [[Hollands Kroon]] | East = [[Medemblik]] | South = [[Koggenland]] | Southwest = [[Heerhugowaard]] | West = [[Hollands Kroon]] }} {{North Holland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of North Holland]] [[Category:Populated places in North Holland]] {{NorthHolland-geo-stub}}
